articles.content:
Message of sympathy to Australian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a message of sympathy to John Howard, Prime Minister of Australia. 
 Noting with great regret that the recent bomb attack in Bali, Indonesia, took a toll of many Australians, the message extended deep sympathy and consolation to those killed or wounded and their bereaved families.    
 Bitterly denouncing the despicable terrorism committed against the innocent people, the message sincerely hoped that the victims and the bereaved families would overcome the pain and sorrow at an early date.
